attributes.action: Use his abilities as PM to influence the Canonization process in the Vatican, so that Boris Johnson,  Margaret Thatcher and Jeremy Clarkson
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
These great people have performed many great acts that could be argued to be miracles among certain great circles.

We the undersigned that none of the said applicants for canonisation are currently deceased, but we believe that the least that the government and the Prime Minister could do is to oficially record their saint-like doings, and to try and gently persuade the Vatican, and other religious communities, around the world, the benefits of sanctification.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
